Number Theory | Wilson's Theorem Example

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { Wilson's } \\\n\text { Theorem } \\\n\qquad 6^{6} \cdot 6^{7} \cdot 7^{6 \cdot 7^{7}}=?\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Wilson's } [/imath] [imath]\text { Theorem } [/imath] [imath]\qquad 6^{6} \cdot 6^{7} \cdot 7^{6 \cdot 7^{7}}=?[/imath]
